snippet: Irina Krush, Mackenzie Molner and Justin Sarkar have all broken through to the next level in their careers.
abstract: Dylan Loeb McClain Chess column highlights rising American chess stars Irina Krush, Mackenzie Molner and Justin Sarkar.
lead_paragraph: Irina Krush, Mackenzie Molner and Justin Sarkar have all broken through to the next level in their careers.

headline.print_headline: Three Up-and-Comers Share Secrets of Success
